title: Episode 108: Ft Kijafa Vick and Carmena from Baller Wives
itunes:title: Episode 108: Ft Kijafa Vick and Carmena from Baller Wives
description:
Kijafa Vick and Carmena from Baller Wives sit with the ladies and Kijafa admits that she would never recommend dating a football player to her friends and speaks on meeting Michael Vick and an awkward first date situation. Kijafa and Carmena talk about shopping their own television shows for years and how they aren't necessarily happy with how this show turned out.
